import React from 'react'; import { Button, Col, Container, Form, Modal, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { miscIcons, profileIcons } from '../assets/icons/all'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { selectUser,setUser } from '../redux/slices/auth'; import { logout } from '../redux/slices/auth'; import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image'; interface PathProps { show: boolean; setShow: (show: boolean) => void; } const dummyUser = { description: '' }; const ProfileModal: React.FC = ({ show, setShow }) => { const userSelected = useSelector(selectUser) || dummyUser; const dispatch = useDispatch(); return ( setShow(false)} centered >
{/* TODO add border-radius to top and bottom rows */}

School Email Phone Major Tell us about yourself in a short bio dispatch(setUser({ description:event.target.value })) } > {userSelected.description.length}/600
); }; export default ProfileModal;
